page.title: 19WINDMILL HILL FARM
page.content: The farm is owned by Mr.Thurgarland and is 140 acres in size. The land is arable and they grow potatoes, barley, wheat and oil seed rape. They rotate the crops into different fields every year because crops take different things from the soil and put different things back. The only animals they have are family pets. They have the following machinery 3 tractors, 1 combine harvester, 1 seed drill, 1 spray, 1 tillage spreader, 2 rotavators, potato lifters, spinners and ridgers. They also have four corn trailers and two small trailers. He employs one man all the year round and during the potato harvest he will get some women to help him and an extra driver. During harvest time Gordon helps him get the combines ready and helps to harvest the grain. This is sold to the local seed merchant.
